webpages.title: Quick Facts
webpages.description: The webpage provides information on academic offerings, enrollment statistics, notable features, student body, and faculty.
webpages.imageAlt: Top of Carlow University's 'Quick Facts' webpage. Details an image as well as facts about the schools majors offered, student enrollment, amd degree levels awarded.

webpages.title: Tracking Our Success: Connecting with Future Leaders
webpages.description: This webpage provides information on how Carlow University tracks the success of its students and graduates. It includes blog, Instagram, LinkedIn, and YouTube posts. (This page has been updated since I stopped interning at carlow)
webpages.imageAlt: Top of Carlow University's 'Tracking Our Success: Connecting with Future Leaders' webpage. Details two blog posts that contains an image, link, and brief summary.

webpages.title: Carlow’s Institutional Goals
webpages.description: This web page details Carlow University’s institutional goals of focusing on their commitment to student success, academic excellence, community engagement, and enhancing the student experience.
webpages.imageAlt: Top of Carlow University's 'Carlow’s Institutional Goals' webpage. Details 3 images in a collage and the beginning of the text on the webpage.
